Class CommandlineScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.common.virusscan.impl.CommandlineScanner

    public class CommandlineScanner
extends Object
implements VirusScanner
    This class use the command line for scanning content.

      • scan

        public InputStream scan(InputStream stream)
                 throws VirusScannerException,
                        VirusFoundException
        Scan an input stream for virus.
        Specified by:
        scan in interface VirusScanner
        Parameters:
        stream - Data stream
        Returns:
        Return true if a virus was detected else false, when no virus was detected
        Throws:
        VirusScannerException - This Exception encapsulate any exception
        VirusFoundException - This only thrown when a virus was found
